sense.gloss: to feel around for, to fumble for, to grope for, to search for, to look for
to investigate, to probe into, to spy on, to sound out
to explore (parts unknown), to enjoy (natural beauty)

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑至上↑↓しじょう↓↑命題↑↓めいだい↓はこの↑紛争↑↓ふんそう↓にすっぱりと↑終止符↑↓しゅうしふ↓を↑打↑↓う↓つことであって、そのために↑妥協↑↓だきょう↓↑点↑↓てん↓を|↑探↑↓さぐ↓る|ことも↑辞↑↓じ↓さない。
sdata.e: Our top priority is to settle this dispute once and for all, so we are ready to meet them halfway.
